text: Dani Filth (born Daniel Lloyd Davey, born 25 July 1973)The Encyclopedia of Popular Music. Page 378. Author - Colin Larkin. 5th concise edition (published 2011). First published in 2007. Published by Omnibus Press in London, England, UK. Retrieved via Google Books on 17 December 2018. is an English singer. He is the founder and lead singer of the extreme metal band Cradle of Filth. He co-wrote a book with Gavin Baddeley titled The Gospel of Filth which documented the history of the band. He also appeared in the movie Cradle of Fear where he portrayed The Man. He has been accused of being a Satanist, but denounced the claims and said that he was "more of a Luciferian". He was ranked at #95 in the Top 100 Heavy Metal Vocalists by Hit Parader. ==References== ==Other websites== *Cradle of Filth website Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:British esotericists Category:English singers Category:Heavy metal singers Category:People from Herefordshire
title: Dani Filth
